1.content:
The mission was supposed to have been a relatively easy one: Go to the small village, fetch a scroll from a rice farmer, and leave. But this was not the case; they had been kidnapped. While normally Kakashi would have been able to fight off any attack, with three young genin to look after, it quickly became impossible. So they were defeated, knocked out and taken to a strange building. All had been fitted with chakra-suppressing collars, rendering them helpless. But Kakashi, as he sat in his cell that was separate from the others, tried to stay positive. He had to be calm. He would not let himself to lose this all just because he was not calm. He tried to think how long he had been stuck in the small cell and realized it could have been for more than a day or two. The door to his cell swung open. Without saying a word, his two guards entering his cell. Without a word and much too fast for him to see in his weakened state, one of the guards quickly formed a fast succession of hand signs before he took Kakashi by the neck. he removed his hand, but Kakashi was still, his open eye blank, his arms down by his side.

"Stand."

He stood, his mind far away from whatever his body was doing.

"Follow me."

He followed, his movements slow but precise. The guard he followed led him to a large room, a throne room almost. The ceilings were high, the walls brightly colored, with divans and couches, bright pillows and warm rugs covering the floor. By the far wall sat a man on a particularly large couch. In front of him stood the rest of Team 7, Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura, their eyes just as blank as Kakashi's.

"Good," the man named Hiku said, smiling at his new toys. "Remove your clothes."

All four obeyed, removing all clothing until all four stood naked in front of their new master. The man's smile became even bigger. He stood up and slowly made his way to his new slaves. He stood in front of Sakura, fondling her small breasts. "Hm, too small." He made several quick signs, activating her jutsu.

"Yes, my master?"

"All you can think of doing is of gaining weight. Any food put in front of you, you will eat. You are a true sloth, only wanting to eat and rest. You also enjoy being fondled while eating."

Next he moved to Sasuke, activating him and Naruto at once."Yes, my master?" they both asked.

"You are both whores. You will do whatever ask. You are both bimbos incapable of doing anything without my approval. You are both stupid and constantly horny."

And then there was Kakashi. "Yes, my master?"

"And you, my pet, are a dog. A bitch to be more precise. You will act like a dog, unable to stand on your legs, stupid, unable to speak. As a bitch, you will produce breast milk."

Now what happens?
1.title: A Mission Gone Wrong
